vote.title: Authorize a decrease to the professional services contract with United Way of Metropolitan Dallas for certified skills training, workforce training, and education services for employment opportunities in regional high demand industries to re-skill or up-skill City residents for the Small Business Center for a term of two years - Not to exceed ($672,558.80), decreasing the contract amount from $2,249,830.45 to $1,577,271.65 - Financing: 2020 CARES Act Relief CDBG #3 Fund
vote.description: Authorize a decrease to the professional services contract with United Way of Metropolitan Dallas for certified skills training, workforce training, and education services for employment opportunities in regional high demand industries to re-skill or up-skill City residents for the Small Business Center for a term of two years - Not to exceed ($672,558.80), decreasing the contract amount from $2,249,830.45 to $1,577,271.65 - Financing: 2020 CARES Act Relief CDBG #3 Fund
